# Pravdast - Business Engineering Platform

## About Pravdast
Pravdast is a Bulgarian business engineering consultancy specializing in predictable growth systems for B2B companies. We transform chaos into controlled, measurable business growth through engineering-based approaches.

## Core Services

### SEO Struktor™ - Online Dominance System
- **Description**: Building online presence like a fortress through precise site structure and content that answers client questions
- **Features**: Technical foundation that Google understands, content that builds trust, continuous optimization for long-term positioning
- **URL**: https://www.pravdagency.eu/services/seo-struktor

### Trendlab™ - Impactful Content Creation System  
- **Description**: Creating fuel for growth through videos, articles and visual materials that tell your story and demonstrate expertise
- **Features**: Video content creation, social media management, converting unique stories into selling content
- **URL**: https://www.pravdagency.eu/services/trendlab

### Clickstarter™ - Accelerated Growth System
- **Description**: Using paid channels to put your message directly in front of ideal clients when they're ready to buy
- **Features**: Precise audience targeting, clear ROI measurement, rapid offer validation
- **URL**: https://www.pravdagency.eu/services/clickstarter

### Clientomat™ - Automated Client Relationship System
- **Description**: Creating automated process that converts interested visitors into loyal clients while maintaining relationships
- **Features**: Communication automation, personalized customer journeys, time-saving business process focus
- **URL**: https://www.pravdagency.eu/services/clientomat

## Key Pages
- **Homepage**: https://www.pravdagency.eu/ - Main business engineering approach and services overview

- **Blog**: https://www.pravdagency.eu/blog - Industry insights and business growth content

## Business Philosophy
"Stop betting on luck, start building systems" - We don't offer marketing; we build systems that give you control over growth.

## Target Audience
B2B companies in Bulgaria seeking predictable growth through systematic approaches rather than random marketing tactics.

## Technical Notes
- Bulgarian language primary content
- Built on modern React/TypeScript stack
- SEO optimized with comprehensive structured data
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Performance optimized for Core Web Vitals
